mapper.select: select row_number() over(order by cb.reg_dt desc) as num , cb.brd_id , cb.brd_type , cb.brd_sj , cb.brd_cn , cb.noti_inq_cnt , cb.pup_yn , cb.pup_bg_dt , cb.pup_ed_dt , cb.ord , cb.file_group_id , cb.reg_id , cb.reg_dt , cb.mod_id , cb.mod_dt , cb.important_yn , cb.hidden_yn , kgst.fngetlangnm(view.user_nm_kg, view.user_nm_ru, view.user_nm_kg, #{lang}) as reg_nm , kgst.fngetlangnm(cd.dept_nm1, cd.dept_nm2, cd.dept_nm3, #{lang}) as dept_nm from com_board cb inner join view_user_member view on view.user_id = cb.reg_id left join com_dept cd on cd.dept_cd = cb.cmt_cd where brd_id = #{id}
select brd_id , brd_type , brd_sj , brd_cn , TO_CHAR(reg_dt, 'DD/MM/YY') AS reg_dt from com_board where brd_type = #{brdType} order by brd_id desc limit 5

select brd_id , brd_type , brd_sj , brd_cn , noti_inq_cnt , pup_yn , pup_bg_dt , pup_ed_dt , ord , file_group_id , reg_id , reg_dt , mod_id , mod_dt from sndb.com_board where 1=1 and brd_type = 'NOTI' and pup_yn = 'Y' and (pup_bg_dt is null or to_char(current_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= pup_bg_dt) and (pup_ed_dt is null or to_char(current_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') <= pup_ed_dt)
